diminish.translation[0].definitions[0].d: to become or make something become smaller or less
diminish.translation[0].definitions[0].e: The party’s share of the electorate has diminished steadily.
These drugs diminish blood flow to the brain.
diminish.translation[0].definitions[1].d: to deliberately make someone or something appear less important or valuable than they really are
diminish.translation[0].definitions[1].e: Don’t let him diminish your achievements.
But that’s not to diminish the importance of his discoveries.
